title: Hi Riot Games! Its about Red card & Kitty cat Katarina skins..
body:
Hi! :)
My gf has been using katarina as her favorite mid lane champ and we have tried so hard  to get those two skins through mystery skin box..
if you check my ID you will see how badly i wanted to get them..:(
She has about 60 champions available and owned almost every skins of them.srsly.
So.. are those two katarina skins are available to get by opening mystery skin box??
if so, we would keep try but if not,,
is there any other way? such as skin code..or any.. :)

replies.body: Yes, I bought 3 mystery skins for myself and got Red Card Katarina. You just have to be lucky I guess, I don't own many skins.

Legacy skins are only available during special events, and when *certain* mystery gifts are made available. Usually, there's no way to get them at all.

The whole point of it is that they're meant to be much harder to acquire than regular skins.

I wish you the best of luck in getting them.
